name: Messenger of Calamity
summary: 《The Messenger》 has held the title of Best-Operated Game Worldwide for ten consecutive years.It was also the first MMORPG to surpass ten million concurrent players.Yan Qing had never played it before.But now—He is the only player left in the game.
author: Marctempest
